titleStmt.title: By his Excellency the Lord General. Whereas complaints have been made, that divers souldiers most unconscionably have broken into mens gardens, orchards, and grounds ...
titleStmt.author: Fairfax, Thomas Fairfax, Baron, 1612-1671.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Given under my hand and Seal, the 24. of Iuly 1649. T. Fairfax.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
